item.title: Apple iPhone 17 Launch Evokes Positive Response From Wall Street: Retail’s Confidence Intact
item.description: Morgan Stanley analyst Erik Woodring described Apple’s event as a “small positive surprise,” highlighting the debut of the iPhone 17 Air.

item.title: Hims & Hers Stock Rises After Company Launches Treatment Plans For Low Testosterone

item.title: Klarna Stock Makes A Strong Debut On NYSE, Shares Surge 33%
item.description: The Swedish fintech company had 34.3 million shares on offer and raised $1.37 billion for the company and its shareholders through the IPO.

item.title: Chewy Stock Sinks 15% As Q2 Net Income Falls: Here's What This Analyst Has To Say
item.description: Analysts at Mizuho noted that Chewy shares are down meaningfully on "another OpEx miss" and incremental investments planned for the second half.
